orig_text: The abstract says "This document describes PNG (Portable Network Graphics)" and "This specification defines the Internet Media Type image/png."
correct_text: The publication of RFC 2083 has been overtaken by further work in the W3C. The latest specification for PNG can be found at https://www.w3.org/TR/png-3/
notes: Someone who finds the RFC might think it is the current PNG spec.
